mapper.insert: insert into room(room_no, room_title, room_owner) values(#{roomNo}, #{roomTitle}, #{roomOwner})
mapper.select: select room_no as roomNo, room_title as roomTitle, room_owner as roomOwner from room order by room_no desc
select count(*) from room_user where room_no = #{roomNo} and users_id = #{usersId}
